Title: When You're Tired of Breaking Other Hearts
Plot: Katie Couric guest stars as herself when Rayna appears on the "Katie" show, trying to set the record straight about her marriage and balancing her career with motherhood. Juliette attempts to take her album launch into her own hands but it backfires when she tweets out a surprise concert location. Maddie lies to Teddy about her whereabouts ? with dangerous consequences ? and Deacon is drawn to his dog?s pretty new veterinarian, Stacey.
